title: Power Outages Cascade as Big Winter Storm Reaches US East Coast
description: A massive winter storm reached the US Atlantic Coast on Sunday, bringing heavy snow and ice, straining power grids and grounding thousands of flights at levels not seen since the pandemic. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: A massive winter storm reached the US Atlantic Coast on Sunday, bringing heavy snow and ice, straining power grids and grounding thousands of flights at levels not seen since the pandemic. (Source: Bloomberg)
